One day, when Kaede Sakuragi, a famous b*tch, was about to be taken away by a tough-looking Yankee man, I rescued her.

After that, as I get to know her better, I realized that she is actually rather naive and gullible. But it was still not known to me that she has an extremely ridiculous yandere side to her…>
